title: boclair house
short: The Boclair House is one of Glasgows most magnificent hotels and wedding venues.Exchange your vows in picturesque gardens and Victorian style wedding marquee. Close by Glasgow.Exclusive Use Venue.
long: Situated in the immaculate gardens at the foot of Boclair Hill, our Glasgow wedding venue is a Tudor Gothic Mansion known for its beautiful red sandstone exterior. Offering the perfect setting, our venueboasts luxury interior including a grand ballroom for your celebration, and opulent suites for you and your guests to enjoy.With the entire venue to yourself, you can relax in the knowledge that you have complete privacy for your special day.
